W13_WRLD_COMM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_WRLD_COMM_000_DETAIL.text: On the other side of the door, you find yourself in a sand-covered world called the Crowrealm.

W13_WRLD_COMM_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_WRLD_COMM_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: The Crowrealm is an apocalyptic desert. Just what is going to happen here?

W13_WRLD_COMM_INITIAL_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_WRLD_COMM_INITIAL_010_DETAIL.text: The Crowrealm is an apocalyptic desert. What fate awaits you here?

W13_LTXT_COMM_HUMANOID_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_LTXT_COMM_HUMANOID_000_DETAIL.text: A massive humanoid robot. Used as a weapon in an ancient war, its days of walking around are clearly over.

W13_LTXT_COMM_TWOLEGS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_LTXT_COMM_TWOLEGS_000_DETAIL.text: A massive bipedal robot. Used as a weapon in an ancient war, its days of walking around are clearly over.

W13_LTXT_COMM_FOURLEGS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_LTXT_COMM_FOURLEGS_000_DETAIL.text: A massive quadruped robot. Used as a weapon in an ancient war, its days of walking around are clearly over.

W13_LTXT_COMM_TANK_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_LTXT_COMM_TANK_000_DETAIL.text: A massive robot shaped like a tank. Used as a weapon in an ancient war, its days of moving around are clearly over.

W13_LTXT_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_LTXT_COMM_INDUSTRIAL_000_DETAIL.text: A massive industrial robot. Used as a weapon in an ancient war, its days of moving around are clearly over.

W13_LTXT_COMM_AIRSHIP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_LTXT_COMM_AIRSHIP_000_DETAIL.text: This airship ruled the skies during an ancient war. Alas, it seems it will never take to them again.

W13_LTXT_COMM_WARSHIP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_LTXT_COMM_WARSHIP_000_DETAIL.text: This battleship ruled the seas during an ancient war. Alas, it seems it will never sail them again.

W13_LTXT_COMM_FERRY_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_LTXT_COMM_FERRY_000_DETAIL.text: This ship carried countless weapons during an ancient war. Clearly it will never do so again.

W13_LTXT_COMM_DIVING_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_LTXT_COMM_DIVING_000_DETAIL.text: This submarine ruled the depths during an ancient war. Alas, its days of patrolling the abyss are over.

W13_GIMK_COMM_SANDSTORM01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_GIMK_COMM_SANDSTORM01_000_DETAIL.text: This sandstorm is blocking your progress. You'll have to find another route to reach the other side.

W13_EVAR_COMM_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_DETAI.text: The flow of the sand prevents you from moving about as you please. Isn't there anything you can do?

W13_SCAN_COMM_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_SCAN_COMM_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: There are four wreckage sites you can aim for: the battleship, the airship, the submarine, and the cruise ship.
